about_the_game:
Celestwald Adventure Puzzles: Embark on an Extraordinary Journey in a Magical World!

All game images have been hand-drawn by Anne-Murielle, and the music has been specially created for Celestwald by Eric Matyas

Choose Your Character and Become an Apprentice Alchemist


In Celestwald Adventure Puzzles, you will step into the shoes of an apprentice alchemist under the mentorship of the renowned Master Theo. To become a master alchemist, you will embark on countless quests and solve captivating puzzles.

Dive Deep into the Magical World


Your first mission is to uncover why Babaorom, Master Theo's magical pet, is always grumpy. After solving this mystery, you will focus on your true objective: harvesting the magical seeds from the Celestwald Tree, the Tree of Dreams. To do this, you will face increasingly challenging puzzles and obstacles. You will also explore new locations and encounter fascinating characters along the way.

Puzzles that Test Your Intelligence, Logic, and Creativity


The puzzles in Celestwald Adventure Puzzles are designed to test your intelligence, logic, and creativity. These puzzles will keep you engaged and entertained for hours.

An Engrossing Story Full of Twists and Turns


The game's narrative is immersive and full of twists and turns. You will feel deeply connected to the world of Celestwald and eager to uncover all its secrets.

Are You Ready for an Epic Adventure?


If you are looking for a challenging and exhilarating adventure, Celestwald Adventure Puzzles is the game for you. Prove your skills in this magical world filled with challenging quests and mysterious puzzles.

Additional Information and Help


If you get stuck or want to continue exploring, visit our website for FAQs and solution videos.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Ge Force GTX 260, Ati Radeon 4870 HD or equivalente card with at least 612 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4850, NVIDIA GeForce GT 120, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM

  • Sound Card: Internal Sound Card

short_description: Embark on an adventure and explore an enchanted forest filled with mysteries and challenges. Play as a hero, solve puzzles, and help Celestwald, the Tree of Dreams. With hand-drawn enchanting graphics and adorable gameplay, Celestwald is available on Windows, macOS, and Linux.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Italian
